tuv.seg: National speed limits in Ireland
Teorainneacha luais náisiúnta in Éirinn
There are five different types of speed limits on roads
Tá cúig cineál teorainn luais ar bhóithre
Find out about the different limits, where they apply and penalties for speeding offences
Faigh eolas faoi na teorainneacha éagsúla, cá mbíonn siad i bhfeidhm, agus na pionóis a bhaineann le coireanna luais
Seatbelts when motoring in Ireland
Criosanna sabhála a úsáid in Éirinn

There is a legal obligation in Ireland to be restrained when motoring and this applies to drivers and passengers. Overview of the law currently in place regarding the wearing of seatbelts and child restraints in motor vehicles
Tá dualgas dlíthiúil ann in Éirinn lena bheith srianta mar a bhítear ag gluaisteánaíocht agus feidhmíonn sé seo do thiománaithe agus do phaisineirí araon
Safety advice for motorists
Comhairle Shábháilteachta do ghluaisteánaithe
Basic precautions and advice motorists can take to ensure that they travel safely
Réamhchúraimí bunúsacha agus comhairle bhunúsach a fhéadann tiománaithe a ghlacadh chun a chinntiú go dtaistealaíonn siad go sábháilte
Safety advice for motorcyclists
Comhairle Sábháilteachta do ghluaisrothaithe
Motorcycling can be a safe means of transport but being aware of the various dangers on the road, your own driving style and your obligations as a road user will help to ensure that you travel safely
Is féidir leat a bheith sábháilte ag taisteal ar ghluaisrothar
School Traffic Wardens are employed to help primary school children cross public roads safely
Fostaítear Maoir Tráchta Scoile chun cabhrú le páistí bunscoile bóithre poiblí a thrasnú go sábháilte
Find out about their duties and your obligations as a road user
Faigh eolas faoina ndualgais agus faoi do fhreagrachtaí mar úsáideoir bóthair
There are a number of national roads that impose a toll (levy or charge) on each vehicle using these roads
Tá líon na mbóthar go hiomlán a ghearrann dola (táille) ar gach feithicil a úsáideann na bóithre seo
Find out about tolls and who is exempt from paying them
Faigh amach faoi dholaí agus an fáth go ngearrtar iad in Éirinn

Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Taisteal agus Áineas"

Ag déanamh iarratais ar phas Éireannach

Pas Éireannach a athnuachan
